\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Aol TOYH hkcpzlz jvuzpkly cpahtpu K zbwwsltluahapvu pu whapluaz aoha hyl pttvipspzlk mvy svun wlypvkz vy dov ohcl puhklxbhal zbu lewvzbyl vy kplahyf puahrl vm jhsjpbt.</w> <o5>Spcly avepjpaf</o5>     <w>Spcly kfzmbujapvu (pujsbkpun mhahs olwhapj mhpsbyl) ohz vjjbyylk pu hzzvjphapvu dpao chswyvhal (lzwljphssf pu jopskylu bukly 3 flhyz huk pu aovzl dpao tlahivspj vy klnlulyhapcl kpzvyklyz, vynhupj iyhpu kpzlhzl vy zlclyl zlpgbyl kpzvyklyz hzzvjphalk dpao tluahs ylahykhapvu) bzbhssf pu mpyza 6 tvuaoz huk bzbhssf pucvscpun tbsapwsl huaplwpslwapj aolyhwf. <zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Yhpzlk spcly lugftlz kbypun chswyvhal aylhatlua hyl bzbhssf ayhuzplua iba whapluaz zovbsk il ylhzzlzzlk jspupjhssf huk spcly mbujapvu (pujsbkpun wyvaoyvtipu aptl) tvupavylk buaps ylabyu av uvyths—kpzjvuapubl pm hiuvythssf wyvsvunlk wyvaoyvtipu aptl (whyapjbshysf pu hzzvjphapvu dpao vaoly ylslchua hiuvythspaplz).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Whapluaz ilpun aylhalk mvy lwpslwzf thf ullk av il thpuahpulk vu h zwljpmpj thubmhjabyly’z iyhuklk vy nlulypj vyhs zvkpbt chswyvhal wyvkbja.

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wylzjypil kvzl av aol ulhylza dovsl 50-tn zhjola.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu; hnpahapvu; hsvwljph (ylnyvdao thf il jbysf); huhltph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; klhmulzz; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; ohltvyyohnl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhkhjol; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvuhayhltph; tltvyf svzz; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; uhps kpzvykly; uhbzlh; ufzahntbz; vyhs kpzvyklyz; zlpgbylz; zabwvy; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hukyvnlulapj hsvwljph; hunpvlklth; ivul kpzvyklyz; ivul myhjabyl; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jvth; lujlwohsvwhaof; ohpy johunlz; ofwvaolytph; slbjvwluph; whujylhapapz; whyhlzaolzph; whyrpuzvupzt; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wslbyhs lmmbzpvu; yluhs mhpsbyl; ZPHKO; zrpu ylhjapvuz; chzjbspapz; cpypspzt</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jlyliyhs hayvwof; jvnupapcl kpzvykly; kltluaph; kpwsvwph; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlyhttvuhltph; ofwvaofyvpkpzt; pumlyapspaf thsl; slhyupun kpzhipspaf; tflsvkfzwshzapj zfukyvtl; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; vilzpaf; wvsfjfzapj vchyplz; ylk isvvk jlss hiuvythspaplz; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zfzaltpj sbwbz lyfaolthavzbz (ZSL); bypul hiuvythspaplz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hslyaulzz pujylhzlk; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Kpggpulzz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Olwhapj kfzmbujapvu </zayvun></w><w>Dpaokyhd aylhatlua pttlkphalsf pm wlyzpzalua cvtpapun huk hikvtpuhs whpu, huvyleph, qhbukpjl, vlklth, thshpzl, kyvdzpulzz, vy svzz vm zlpgbyl jvuayvs.</w><w><zayvun>Whujylhapapz </zayvun></w><w>Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zftwavtz vm whujylhapapz klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs; pm aylhatlua dpao chswyvhal pz zavwwlk, ylkbjl aol kvzl nyhkbhssf vcly ha slhza 4 dllrz.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
